meanings.definition: A card game similar to whist.
meanings.sent1: During the family gathering, we played trez with the deck of cards.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to play trez at the community center.
meanings.sent3: In the cozy cabin, they spent the evening laughing and playing trez.
meanings.sent4: The atmosphere in the room was tense as they strategized during the trez game.
meanings.sent5: The sound of cards shuffling filled the air as they prepared for a round of trez.

meanings.definition: A three-point field goal in basketball.
meanings.sent1: He scored a trez from beyond the arc, earning cheers from the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The team celebrated their victory after the player made a crucial trez.
meanings.sent3: The coach praised the player for his accurate trez shot during the game.
meanings.sent4: The trez in the final seconds secured the team's win.
meanings.sent5: The trez was the turning point in the intense basketball match.

meanings.sent1: After working hard all week, he finally had enough trez to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent2: She saved up her trez to go on a vacation to the beach.
meanings.sent3: His friends joked that he was always chasing trez instead of enjoying life.
meanings.sent4: Money may not buy happiness, but having enough trez sure makes life easier.
meanings.sent5: The trez jingled in his pocket as he walked down the street, feeling content.
